guide.title: Setup your Vue Markdown Blog in less than 5 minutes
guide.description: (Less than 10 with custom domain). We will post to our final blog by simply editing markdowns directly on GitHub (or pushing them). Cool huh?

guide.title: README
guide.description: Directly loading the raw Markdown from GitHub public repo and displaying it into the Post component

features.title: Posts are compiled with markdown-it
features.description: You can simply edit your markdownns online and your blog will reflect the changes shortly after.

features.title: Use inline bootstrap-ready html
features.description: Another advantage of runtime template compilation is that we can make good use of bootstrap predefined classes since our app has already loaded all its css.
